meta.description: Transform patient care with intelligent automation and predictive analytics.

hero.title: AI-Powered Healthcare Solutions
hero.subtitle: Transform patient care with intelligent automation, predictive analytics, and seamless integration across healthcare systems.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive AI solutions that transform healthcare delivery.

carePlans.title: Care Plans & Tasks
carePlans.description: Coordinate tasks, meds, and routines with real-time updates for families and caregivers.

predictiveInsights.title: Predictive Insights
predictiveInsights.description: AI surfaces trends and early warnings from daily notes and vitals history.

aiAssistance.title: AI Assistance
aiAssistance.description: Smart suggestions, reminders, and summaries that save time for caregivers.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include core CareAI features.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for individuals and small families

pro.name: Professional
pro.description: Ideal for larger families and caregivers

about.title: About CareAI
about.intro: We are an early-stage startup building safe and useful AI solutions for seniors and caregivers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: We believe every care team deserves simple, affordable tools that improve safety and quality of life. CareAI combines intelligent conversation with caregiver workflows to reduce complexity and increase adherence — without claiming to replace clinical judgment.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.body: We're looking for partners for pilot programs: doctors, care homes, insurance companies, and health systems. If you're interested in developing features or measuring outcomes with us, we'd love to connect.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: We see a future where every senior has a trusted digital companion helping them live independently longer, where families feel secure knowing their loved ones are safe, and where healthcare partners can scale while focusing on the human side of care.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Questions, partnerships, or press — we'd love to hear from you.

testimonial.quote: CareAI helped our family coordinate daily care without the chaos. Tasks, reminders, and health insights in one place.

cta.title: Ready to try CareAI?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust CareAI for their healthcare needs

footer.tagline: AI-powered tools for families and caregivers.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Working with leading healthcare organizations to improve patient outcomes through AI-powered solutions
